attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Myself aswell as I believe Thousands of others are sick to death of hearing about these youngsters killing each other and terrorizing communities. This purley has to come to a conclusion. How much longer do we have to be confronted with total lawlessness and disrespect?

I ask the Prime Minister to 

1. Bring back punishments in schools
2. Allow Parents to discipline their children at home. Without the fear of being accused of abuse!
3. Bring back compuslsory National service, For the Forces & all other community services. 
4. Let the police "police" & get office staff to do the paperwork.
5. Clear the streets of Guns & Knives

I'm sure these agendas could help to solve these very worrying times. Please help before it is too late.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
